title: Eurosport - Wikipedia
snippet: WBD would rebrand BT Sport as TNT Sports, deriving its name from its American cable network. In January 2025, it was announced that Eurosport would close in the United Kingdom and Ireland on 28 February 2025, in favour of carrying Eurosport content via TNT Sports channels and platforms.
